original_text: After that, God said to them in a dream, ‘Do not go back to see Herod again.’ So the men followed a different road to return to their own country.
korean_text: 그들은 꿈에 헤롯에게로 돌아가지 말라 지시하심을 받아 다른 길로 고국에 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: God said to them in a dream
Do not go back to see Herod again
So the men followed a different road
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 사람들은 다른 길을 따랐다

sentences.original_text: to return to their own country
